problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,D是AB的中点,BC=5,AC=12,则sin∠DCA的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, D is the midpoint of AB, BC = N_0, AC = N_1, then the value of sin∠DCA is ()
raw_answer:
解:过点D作DE⊥AC于点E,
在Rt△ABC中,AB=√{BC^{2}+AC^{2}}=13,∵点D是AB中点,∴CD=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{13}{2},
又∵DE∥BC,∴DE=\frac{1}{2}BC=\frac{5}{2},∴sin∠DCA=\frac{DE}{CD}=\frac{5}{13}．
故选:B．
raw_formal_point: 直角三角形斜边上的中线
raw_comment: 本题考查了锐角三角函数的定义,注意求出DE,CD的长度是解题关键．
